subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Chris Paul, who led the Hornets with 27 points, scored on a driving layup with 2.6 seconds left to break a tie with the Nets, who did not fare too well without Vince Carter.
snippet: Chris Paul, who led the Hornets with 27 points, scored on a driving layup with 2.6 seconds left to break a tie with the Nets, who did not fare too well without Vince Carter.
